infSerumKinetics <- function(x, a, b, c) {
    titre_est <- 0
    if (x < 14) {
        titre_est <- titre_est + log(exp(a) + exp(c)) * (x) / 14;
    } else {
        titre_est <- titre_est + log(exp(a) * exp(-b/10 * (x - 14)) + exp(c));
    }
    titre_est
}




N <- 100
a_vec <- runif(N, -1, 50)
b_vec <- runif(N, 1, 5)
c_vec <- runif(N, 2, 5)

df_summary <- map_df(1:N,
    function(i) {
        data.frame(
            samle = i,
            x = seq(0, 150, 1),
            f = map_dbl(seq(0, 150, 1), infSerumKinetics, a = a_vec[i], b = b_vec[i], c = c_vec[i]) 
        ) 
    }
) %>% group_by(x) %>% mean_qi(f)


df_summary %>% 
    ggplot() + 
       geom_ribbon(aes(x = x, ymin = .lower, ymax =  .upper), alpha = 0.5) + 
        geom_line(aes(x = x, y = f))




teunis_power <- function(x, y0, y1, v, r, t1) {
    ##y0 <- 0
    mu <- (y1 - y0) / t1
    if (x < t1) {
        titre_est <- y0 + mu * x
    } else {
        titre_est <- y1 - 1 / (r - 1) * log(1 + (r - 1) * 10^(y1)^(r - 1) * v * (x - t1));
    }
    titre_est
}



teunis_power_true <- function(x, y0, y1, r, t1, alpha) {

    v <- 0.001
    mu <- 1 / t1 * y1
    if (x < t1) {
        titre_est <- exp(mu * x)
    } else {
        titre_est <- exp(y1) * (1 + (r - 1) * exp(y1)^{r - 1} * v * (x - t1)) ^ {-1 / (r - 1)}
    }
    titre_est_log <- y0 + log(titre_est) 
    titre_est_log * max(0, 1 - y0 * alpha)
}


y1_vec <- runif(N, 1, 6)
t1_vec <- runif(N, 7, 30)
r_vec <- runif(N, 1, 5)
alpha_vec <- runif(N, 0.2, 0.2)

infTuenisPower2016 <- function(titre_est, timeSince, pars) {

    y1 <- pars[1]
    t1 <- pars[2]
    r <- pars[3]
    alpha <- pars[4]

    v <- 0.001
    mu <- 1 / t1 * y1

    if (timeSince < t1) {
        titre_est_boost <- exp(mu * timeSince)
    } else {
        titre_est_boost <- exp(y1) * (1 + (r - 1) * exp(y1)^{r - 1} * v * (timeSince - t1)) ^ {-1 / (r - 1)}
    }

    titre_est_log <- titre_est + log(titre_est_boost) 
    titre_est_log * max(0, 1 - titre_est * alpha)
}

copFuncForm <- function(esttitreExp, beta0, beta1, mu) {

    p <- mu / (1.0 + exp(- (beta0 + beta1 * esttitreExp) ) )
}

max_titre <- 10

add_par_df("k", 1, 3, "unif", 1, 3)
add_par_df("beta", -3, 0, "unif", -3, 0)
add_par_pool_df_non_centered("beta_z", 2, 0, "beta_sigma", "exp", 1, NA)
add_par_df("alpha", 1, max_titre, "unif", 1, max_titre)
add_par_pool_df_non_centered("alpha_z", 2, 0, "alpha_sigma", "exp", 1, NA)


copFuncFormGeneralised <- function(esttitreExp, gamma, k, beta, beta_z, betz_sigma, alpha, alpha_z, alpha_sigma, p_base ) {

    r <- beta * (esttitreExp - alpha)
    p <- gamma * ((r / (1 + abs(r)^k)^(1 / k)) * 0.5 + 0.5) + p_base
    p
}

require(boot)
N <- 1000
gamma_vec <- runif(N, 0.2, 0.2) # thing dividing the (no fixed effects) (0, 1)
k_vec <- runif(N, 1, 3) # fixed (1, 3)

beta_vec_base <- runif(N, -1, -1) # gradient at 50% point (-3, 0) # heirarchical effects
beta_vec_effect <- rnorm(N, 0, 1) * rexp(N, 1)
beta_vec <-  -inv.logit(beta_vec_base + beta_vec_effect)

alpha_vec_base <- runif(N, 4, 4) # this is the 50% point (1, maxtitre) # heirarchical effects
alpha_vec_effect <- rnorm(N, 0, 1) * rexp(N, 1)
alpha_vec <-  alpha_vec_base + alpha_vec_effect

p_base_vec <- runif(N, 0.5, 0.5)

df_summary <- map_df(1:N,
    function(i) {
        data.frame(
            samle = i,
            x = seq(0, 10, 0.1),
            f = map_dbl(seq(0, 10, 0.1), copFuncFormGeneralised, gamma = gamma_vec[i], k = k_vec[i], beta = beta_vec[i], alpha = alpha_vec[i], p_base = p_base_vec[i]) 
        ) 
    }
) %>% group_by(x) %>% mean_qi(f, .width = c(0.1, 0.5, 0.75, 0.95))
